author: aandvalenzuela
body: Testing with `oracle` pkg. `AutoReq` to be removed also in [`ucx`](https://github.com/aandvalenzuela/cmsdist/blob/a99b9b044d3ca31f8e5c3e3977c6c0c5414b3a53/ucx.spec#L11), [`llvm`](https://github.com/aandvalenzuela/cmsdist/blob/a99b9b044d3ca31f8e5c3e3977c6c0c5414b3a53/llvm.spec#L8), [`openmpi`](https://github.com/aandvalenzuela/cmsdist/blob/a99b9b044d3ca31f8e5c3e3977c6c0c5414b3a53/openmpi.spec#L11), [`cuda-compatible-runtime`](https://github.com/aandvalenzuela/cmsdist/blob/a99b9b044d3ca31f8e5c3e3977c6c0c5414b3a53/cuda-compatible-runtime.spec#L8) and [`cuda`](https://github.com/aandvalenzuela/cmsdist/blob/a99b9b044d3ca31f8e5c3e3977c6c0c5414b3a53/cuda.spec#L17).
title: Force check dependencies for provides and requires
